EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners / Tom Puchalski (1329166256.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / Tom Puchalski (1329166256.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - Consultant Services Email 1024x768 - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Tom, Thank you for the follow up. If you are interested in using MBO to manage your consulting projects in the future or any general questions please do not hesitate to reach out to me and I will be happy to assist you! Have a great day,Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: <bbentley@mbopartners.com">ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailAutoSig> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Tom Puchalski [mailto:tpuch@optonline.net] Sent: Friday, February 10, 2012 2:10 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Tom Puchalski Nicolette: My original interest with MBO was to pursue additional consulting projects with Jones Lang LaSalle. It does not appear that there is any immediate need with them. Merck has contacted me recently and there is a one year assignment that I was given. Merck uses AllSource and I have registered with them as requested. Thanks for the time you spent. Unfortunately things did not work out with JLL. Tom Puchalski On Feb 2, 2012, at 6:43 PM, Nicolette Taylor wrote: Hello Tom, I wanted to follow up with you from our conversation regarding the services provided by MBO Partners. You mentioned you may be starting a new consulting contract. How is that going? Here are a few tools that summarize our conversation from before: - There are some webinars and videos we have created that might assist you in finding your next contract if you have not already found one:
http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC04NiZtZXNzYWdlaWQ9ODYmZGF0YWJhc2VpZD0xMzI2ODUzMzQ0JnNlcmlhbD0xMjY0NjM4Mjk3JmVtYWlsaWQ9dHB1Y2hAb3B0b25saW5lLm5ldCZ1c2VyaWQ9bC0xMjgtMTE3OTctMTA5NTcxNSZleHRyYT0mJiY=&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsX56%2BUoXqazlMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ATsBrI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D> - MBO Partners continues to invest in being a leader for independent consultants across the country. I also wanted to share the news that we released a study you may be interested in. For the first time, there’s real hard facts about The State of Independence in America <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC04NiZtZXNzYWdlaWQ9ODYmZGF0YWJhc2VpZD0xMzI2ODUzMzQ0JnNlcmlhbD0xMjY0NjM4Mjk3JmVtYWlsaWQ9dHB1Y2hAb3B0b25saW5lLm5ldCZ1c2VyaWQ9bC0xMjgtMTE3OTctMTA5NTcxNSZleHRyYT0mJiY=&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/stateofindependence?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsX56%2BUoXqazlMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ATsBrI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D> that will reveal not just how many millions of independent professionals there are in the country, but also the unique things that motivate them and help them stay happily independent.
Any update would be great, look forward to hearing from you. Regards,Nicolette___________________________________Nicolette TaylorEnrollment ManagerMBO Partners t: (703) 793-6281f: 703.793.6081e: www.mbopartners.com <mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com">ntaylor@mbopartners.comw: <span style='color:#353433>
